wikipedia_page.main: Thom Noble is a British film editor who won an Academy Award and an ACE Eddie Award for the film Witness (1985). He was nominated for the Academy Award and the BAFTA Award for Best Editing for the film Thelma & Louise (1991).In 2018, he was on jury for the Mumbai International Film Festival.
